reviews.review: i think it is the first game that literally refreshes my feelings about what a game could be. it is so real in some aspect that the physics elements in this game made other games look just like it.

fun puzzle game 2

If you have not played this game yet, you should. It's a classic of video games. Ask any PC gamer about Portal, and they will know about it. It is a true icon to have in your library, with a great physics engine and loads of community based support the game manages to keep on selling and even winning awards, winning the "Golden Joystick Award" once in its lifetime.

About Portal 2:
Published on 18th April, 2011 by Valve Corporation
Engine: Source

Very smooth but rather short campaign, however the voices and the clever use of props and other system clashes has lead the game to immense popularity. Especially when it comes to the exact words that the characters say, which are in some sense rather a mix of Dark Humour and sensitive Sarcasm.

The game has faired well in the market and is recommended to be bought for its Singleplayer and Co-op campaigns. Also adding a free solution to more gameplay, where the community makes their own maps and creates their own ideas around problems.

With the success of Portal (1), Portal 2 is a great follow-up, following the same principle with again... More Dark Humour and even more Sarcasm.

Verdict:
- A great game with a lot of potential.
- Amazing map creating system for users. (no special programs necessary)
- Great Singleplayer and Co-op campaign.
- Amazing sales throughout its lifetime prove the game to be trustworthy to be bought.
- For a 6 year old (updated 2017) game, it holds a nice amount of awards which bring it to success.
- Impressive use of the Source Engine. So quite similar physics to games like; Half-life 2 and CS:GO.
- A masterpiece of a game and a true classic!
- This game made me cry. Such a beutiful game. ;)

In-general, I would strongly recommend buying the game!

[h1] Portal 2 ist brilliant.[/h1]

Ich bin zu tränen gerührt, denn beide Portal Teile sind absolute Spitzenklasse.

Das Gameplay, die Logik und Schwierigkeit halte ich für sehr gut abgestimmt und das beste an der Portal Reihe, der Humor und die Story, kommen nicht zu kurz.

Von mir gibt es eine absolute Kaufempfehlung, vor Allem für diejenigen, die schon Spiele wie "Please, Don`t Touch Anything", "The Stanley Parable" und "Dr Langeskov, The Tiger And The Terribly Cursed Emerald - A Whirlwind Heist" gespielt haben, denn diese wurden offensichtlich stark von Portal inspiriert.

Update: Ich habe mittlerweile auch die COOP-Kampagne mit einem guten Freund durchgespielt und bin der Meinung, dass auch dieser Teil des  Games absolut zu empfehlen ist, denn zu Portal gesellt sich hier die COOP-Dynamik, die sich bei mir in endlosen Lachanfällen geäußert hat.
Bon jeu histoire sympathique et on en apprend plus sur Glados

Short Review:
Great game, worth it.

In-depth review:
Another amazing game from the world of Half-Life! This game is a gripping adventure through the Aperture Science laboratories while, once again, doing testing for GLaDOS. Naturally, there are some interesting boss battles and well-thought out puzzles in the game. However, I found the old Cave Johnson area of the facility dragged out for a long, long time. An interesting adition to the Portal game are the new Gels; Repulsion Gel, Propulsion Gel, Conversion Gel and Cleansing Gel. They add a facinating twist to the game.

Unlike the original Portal, this game also has a multiplayer co-op which can be played with 1 friend.
Somehow, I managed to find myself a friend, and we played through the first few chapters of the co-op missions. A few things I love about the co-op missions are the gestures, and also the sheer siliness of the Robots. My friend was assigned the role of the Orange robot (the dimmer of the two) and he played that role very well, by messing up things a lot. The puzzles are great and all, but having a friend just adds a whole new level of greatness!

Well, I think I've rambled on long enough and many people will have the "TLDR" attitude, so I have decided to add a Short review at the top.

Thanks for reading,
Agent

Jeu de stratégie consistant à faire évoluer un personnage en vue FPS de salle en salle en le faisant évoluer dans différents puzzles. Si pourtant je me serais imaginé pas du tout attiré par un jeu proposant ce genre de gameplay avant d’en tester un pour la première fois, je me suis laissé happer par Portal 2 et son genre auquel je ne suis en temps normal pas du tout habitué. Ce jeu, en plus d’être intelligent, possède une atmosphère très agréable, notre personnage est un jouet à la merci d’une IA l’utilisant pour une série de tests et lui faisant passer des épreuves toutes aussi dangereuses les unes que les autres, les dialogues sont souvent excellents tant ils sont drôles et les personnages attachants.
Graphiquement le jeu est beau, coté maniabilité on est bon aussi, duré de vie, si on considère les cartes crées par la communauté de joueur on est dans de l’illimité, que ce soit la campagne solo et son scénario, l’outil de création de carte, les cartes créées ou le jeu en cop, ce jeu ne laissera pas indifférent. A posséder et apprécier!

Portal 2 é um dos melhores jogos de todas as épocas e é isso o que posso dizer sobre essa masterpeça que a Valve criou. O modo como a história flui, o carisma envolvido no Wheatley e na Glados é sensacional, e os plot twists da história vão te levar pra lua. Portal 2 merece oscars por ser tão bem desenvolvido, com uma mecânica incrível, com uma gameplay que faz parecer que você ta fazendo um ENEM e vai necessitar de muito QI. O Coop é simplesmente perfeito, você vai se divertir e quando ve jogou toda a campanha online mais de 5 vezes com pessoas diferentes. Compre, compre agora!

当我两个手柄都插上以后，游戏居然还无法识别手柄，这也真是有够让人崩溃的，看来《传送门2》的合作模式是和我和我的朋友无缘了。既然如此，我也可以删除游戏并发评论了。

2代给我的感觉有点微妙，它在继承了一代的系统后，又有所变化，加入了入激光、反射方块、光桥之类的新内容，后面的塑胶也是让人眼前一亮的。虽然白色墙壁的冷色调用得更多了，但是游戏给我的整体感觉是——有些闷。
为什么有这种感觉？首先这个实验室环境大多不透光，后面甚至掉到地底（其实也没出去过），缺少明媚的光源。其次这回的地图设计并不是很好，最初一段和中间很长一段都是在几个实验室来来回回的穿梭，从电梯出来又从电梯离开，感觉这地图换汤不换药，机械感太强了，甚至我都玩得有点烦躁，和1代间隙读取的转场相比总觉得这是一种退步。另外剧情进展也很缓慢，有时候纯粹就是为了解谜而解谜，不像1代把内容和“逃离”这个主题融合在一起，就像Glados说的“你不是爱做实验吗”，然后就强行给你灌一堆解谜。最后1代结尾都出去了，现在2代开场又被弄回来，别提有多郁闷了。
这一代不是谜题不行，而是叙事手法不得力，导致有几个段落特别冗长，代入感也有所丧失，以至于要靠话痨Wheatley来救场。

不过总而言之，2代虽然没了1代的惊艳感，但也还是保持了不错的水准，后面叙事的线索也能串联到一块，[spoiler]最后对月面来的那一发可以说是神来之笔[/spoiler]。

值得注意的是，2代这次除了合作模式，还多了一个地图制作工具，简单易上手，如果故事模式没玩够，可以玩玩那个。

评分：7/10，2代最后故事已经完结了，没有3。

The great sequel of the original Portal, this game has everything you want for a game nowaday: graphics, story, stages (in this game.. puzzles), characters, soundtracks, and co-op mode that.. while it's a little bit complicated when you haven't played the single player story mode, still awesome and worth spending your time on
